name: AXRegistryExportClientConfiguration
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationName
inputs.label: Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration name of the ax client configuration. (Default is used, if empty)

inputs.name: useCurrentUserConfig
inputs.label: Use current user registry settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the current user registry settings be used? (or local machine)

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Configuration file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to save the configuration file.

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX Registry - Export client configuration (.axc): $(configurationName)
